name: Ground Control (itch) (AdventureByte)
description:
Created in 48 hours as a submission to the GMTK-2020 game jam.

Best enjoyed using the itch.io desktop app.

How does this game fit the theme, "Out of Control"?
You are a space pilot helping the passengers of a runaway and out of control space station that is whirling to the ground. You have to wildly maneuver if you hope to catch as many astronauts as possible and each time one latches onto your ship your craft becomes more unstable. Buckle up and good luck! 

Story 

A call for help is made to Ground Control and you're the captain on duty. 
A space station is falling through the atmosphere with astronauts on board!

Brace yourself for this wild rescue mission and catch as many astronauts as possible!

Controls 
Use Arrow Keys or WASD to pilot your ship.

Credits

A Game by Adventure Byte Studios with Music and SFX by Zack Crozier
